dublin_core.dcvalue: Morgan and colleagues put forth a call to action for the transformation of the Canadian healthcare system through the adoption of a national chronic disease prevention and management CDPM strategy They offer examples of best practices and national solutions including investment in clinical information technologies to help support improved care and outcomes Although we acknowledge that the authors propose CDPM solutions that are headed in the right direction more rapid deployment of solutions that harness the potential of advanced collaborative technologies is required We provide examples of how technologies that exist today can help to accelerate the achievement of some key CDPM objectives
